goal: Send an SMS to Alice saying 'See you soon'
self_reflections: To send an SMS to Alice, I need to open the Messages app first, which will allow me to compose and send a text message.
To send an SMS to Alice, I need to start by creating a new message. The "New Message" button will open a new conversation where I can enter Alice as the recipient and type the message "See you soon".
I need to specify the recipient (Alice) before I can compose and send the message. The "To" field is where I enter the recipient's name or phone number.
